biotools.summary: pyInfinityFlow is a Python package that enables imputation of hundreds of features from Flow Cytometry using XGBoost regression1. It is an adaptation of the original implementation in R2 with the goal of optimizing the workflow for large datasets by increasing the speed and memory efficiency of the analysis pipeline.
